name: Circle of Death

components.material: the powder of a crushed black pearl worth 500+ GP

description: Negative energy ripples out in a 60-foot-radius Sphere from a point you choose within range. Each creature in that area makes a Constitution saving throw, taking 8d8 Necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A HUMAN SORCERER CHASTISES GHOULS WITH THE UNPREDICTABLE ENERGY OF A CHROMATIC ORB
higher_level: The damage increases by 2d8 for each spell slot level above 6.
